<h3 id="X31397">X(31397) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {ANTICOMPLEMENTARY, BEVAN, INCIRCLE}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3-(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31397) = X(1)-3*X(10056) = 3*X(2)+X(12648) = X(8)+3*X(11239) = X(1836)-3*X(11237) = X(2099)-3*X(17718) = X(4304)+2*X(5252) = 3*X(10956)-X(12831)</b>

<p>
X(31397) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 12647}, {8, 3870}, {55, 5252}, {1478, 5119}, {2292, 17874}, {3434, 3895}, {10057, 10087}, {10058, 12749}<br>
X(31397) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1, 13405), (226, 495), (956, 5745), (4304, 55), (4847, 10)<br>
X(31397) = complement of the complement of X(12648)<br>
X(31397) = X(10)-of-inner-Yff triangle<br>
X(31397) = X(946)-of-1st Johnson-Yff triangle<br>
X(31397) = X(1210)-of-inner-Yff tangents triangle<br>
X(31397) = X(4847)-of-outer-Garcia triangle<br>
X(31397) = X(12647)-of-anti-Aquila triangle<br>
X(31397) = X(13405)-of-Aquila triangle<br>
X(31397) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (10, 10915, 6736), (145, 5703, 1), (18395, 21625, 1210)<br>
</p>
